mapper.insert: insert into t_department (role_ID, role_Name, priority, parent_Id, parent_Ids, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_department set role_Name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_Id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_Ids = #{parentIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where role_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select role_ID, role_Name, priority, parent_Id, parent_Ids, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_department where role_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select role_ID, role_Name, priority, parent_Id, parent_Ids, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_department
